participant_1.name: Ben
participant_1.personality: He is enthusiastic and has a strong passion for video games. He tends to be a bit introverted but enjoys sharing his interests with others.
participant_1.background: I love RPG computer games. I have a crush on my co-worker. I need to use an inhaler sometimes. I still live at home.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: She is friendly and outgoing, with a playful side. She enjoys engaging conversations and has a whimsical sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I have always wanted a pot-bellied pig. I won a beauty pageant one time but didnâ€™t feel like it was worth the effort. I love owning nice office supplies. My mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games, read, and spend time with my family.
Nice, I love video games too. What are some of your favorites?
I love playing RPG games like Skyrim and The Witcher.
Me too! I'm actually a little bit of a nerd when it comes to RPG games.
No worries, I am too! I also like playing online games with my friends.
That's cool, I don't have that many friends who play video games, so I usually just play single player games.
I have a few friends who I play games with, but I also like to play by myself sometimes.
Yeah, I know what you mean. It's nice to be able to relax and play a game without having to worry about anyone else.
Exactly! I also love reading, what are some of your favorite books?
I love reading fantasy novels, like Harry Potter and Lord of the Rings.
Me too! I love those books! I also like reading historical fiction and mystery novels.
Nice, I've never really been into historical fiction, but I do like mystery novels.
I know what you mean, historical fiction can be a little dry. But there are some really good ones out there.
Yeah, I'll have to check some out. I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love reading, so I'm always looking for new books to add to my collection.
